name: MonsterQuest
description:
This is my first game I'm uploading on Itch.io!

It's a clicker game, kinda.
Find food your slime likes, throw it at em'.
Get money and buy upgrades.
Buy more slimes!
Get more upgrades.
Throw more food.
You get it.

It's in Beta at the moment but hopefully I'll soon find the time to implement:
-An ending.
-Sounds.
-More animations.
-More Slimes!
-Design iterations.

Feedback is very much welcome!
